Summary: Datepickers don't change back to labels when out of focus

Description:
* dates should be aligned to the center
* column “fte” should be aligned to the center and can be more narrow
* change “alkalmazottak” to “tagok” (“employees” to “member”)
* count in column “members”: it should count all the members with plan from the current day to the future (not just the members on the current day)
* in case of add new project, the count in column members should be 0 as well (as in competence)

* Column “planned” can be more narrow
* Column “position” can be wider
* Column “free from”: display dates without background

* Column project state and competence can be more narrow (the size of the column header text)
* Column member can be wider (rest of the space)
* Table should fill up the space instead of scrolling
* Search should be possible by the members with a plan in the future as well (instead of the members on just the current day)

Summary: Refactor employee search to use RxJS
Pagination stopped working after refactor in search

Description:
When subscribing to a modal, there are no reject functions provided for the then() function, only resolves. This results in an error being thrown.

*Solution*: instead of dismissing, close the modal with  a ‘false’ parameter or provide a reject function (first suggestion is more suitable here)

Summary: Refactor Employee's getAllEmployees() method to getAllEmployeesByCompany()

Description:
!image-20230919-122405.png|width=1385,height=490!

!image-20230919-122429.png|width=1091,height=502!

The search is case-sensitive. If we want to look up a competency that has uppercase letters and we use lowercase letters in the search bar, the competency will not be circled.

*Solution*:

Add lowerCase() function to both strings before comparing them in the isSearchResult() method of tr-employee.component.ts

Add new project to the list
Description:
!Screenshot 2023-09-08 at 10.27.33-20230908-082738.png|width=1140,height=693!



* The user can add new project to the list, by clicking on the “add project” button.
* The user can type the name of the new project in the first empty line opened by the “add project” button.
* The user can see the newly added project in the first line until the page is not reloaded.
* In case of reload the page, the newly added project has to take its place according to the last configured sorting.
* As soon es the new line opened for the new project, the max relevant project number is increased by 1.

Separate the application components from the authentication component(s) (login component) for correct navigation
Delegate displayed texts in order to avoid “magic strings”, and help internationalization

The purpose of using Redis is to increase the security of the API by making the authentication stateful.

This way we can revoke the token of a user and thus implementing a logout on the server side as well, not just on the frontend.

This can be done by configuring a Redis instance to be used in the application and saving the active token for each user in it as well as checking this token with every http request that is made to the API.

Even though this would increase the security of the application, the improvement is not high priority momentarily and its configuration and implementation could take several days.

The implementation should be kept in the backlog and we should get back to it later if we have the time or see the need for it.

Summary: Add and delete competence to employee
Description:
*Add - Scenario 1:*

The user can add competence to an employee row in the cells junior, medium or senior by drag the competency and drop it in the cell.

The dropped competence will not disappear from the competence list.



*Add - Scenario 2:*

The user can add competence to an employee row in the cells junior, medium or senior by double-clicking in the cell he/she would add and click on the + icon beside the selected competence.



*Delete*

The user can delete the competency from the employees cell by clicking on the x at the end of the competency tag.

* the user can modify the employee data by double-clicking on the selected cell
* the user can see the saved result by enter or by clicking somewhere else on the site
